descriptionHtml:
This mod make Saadia face better. None aditional resource is required.

Changed her face values and hair. Eye and scar is the same


Instalation: 

Just move the file Saadia better face.exp to your Skyrim data folder. Or use Nexus mod manager.

Unistall:

Delete de file Saadia better face.esp


Please report if find any bug, this is my first mod. The only problem could happen is the diferent skin tone from head and body, a usuall problem for npcs made or edited in creation kit. After some instructions found in google I solved it, but if it happen for you let me know.
author: sonidenx
